item.title: TSM
item.description: score:3 Chances: TSMC is benefiting from the rising chip sales due to the rising effectiveness of artificial intelligence. The Russell 2000 (^RUT) has been trading at a generally flat range for the past 2 years, but the small-cap index has started to consolidate and begin to break out from its pattern over the past few months.
